Name: Hentai Asmodeus
About the game: 10 year ago, five Demon Lords have been sealed into five Saintess. The Saintess disappeared after that. An adventurer finds the Saintess and defeats them to get Demon’s power to save his life. Let’s conquer all Saintess by cutting their Narutal Power! Using your power spirit to destroy their stream of power before they can use all power to defeat you! Features: 20 levels, each Saintess has 4 levels, each of them has their own ability to make your conquest more difficult. It’s a casual tile-matching puzzle game so each time you play is a new experience, you won’t get bored because of magic element appear in stage. Collect gold to upgrade your skills, buy items to defeat the Saintess more easier. If you want to learn more about the story and the girls, you need to beat them first. The beatiful and hot Saintess with rewards for defeating them 3 times is waiting for you. Disclaimer: All characters are over 18 years old.
